widgets.title: Application Performance Score : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT ((filter(count(*),WHERE apdexPerfZone= 'S' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'S') + (filter(count(*), WHERE apdexPerfZone = 'T' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'T')/2))/count(*))*100 AS '% Score' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Application Performance Score : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT ((filter(count(*),WHERE apdexPerfZone= 'S' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'S') + (filter(count(*), WHERE apdexPerfZone = 'T' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'T')/2))/count(*))*100 AS '% Score' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Application Performance Score : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT ((filter(count(*),WHERE apdexPerfZone= 'S' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'S') + (filter(count(*), WHERE apdexPerfZone = 'T' OR `nr.apdexPerfZone` = 'T')/2))/count(*))*100 AS '% Score' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 week ago

widgets.title: Application Quality Score : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT 100 * apdex(duration , t: 0.03) AS '%' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' and appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET appName

widgets.title: Application Quality Score : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT 100 * apdex(duration , t: 0.03) AS '%' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' and appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET appName

widgets.title: Application Quality Score : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT 100 * apdex(duration , t: 0.03) AS '%' WHERE username NOT LIKE '%acme.com' AND (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') FACET appName

widgets.title: Errors by Application : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET appName SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Errors by Application : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET appName SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Errors by Application : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') FACET appName SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Top Transaction Errors : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET transactionName SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Top Transaction Errors : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET transactionName SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Top Transaction Errors : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM TransactionError SELECT count(*) AS 'Count' WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') FACET transactionName SINCE 1 hour ago

widgets.title: Application Response Time (ms) : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT average(duration)*1000 AS 'ms' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 hours ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Application Response Time (ms) : AWS
widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT average(duration)*1000 AS 'ms' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 hours ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Application Response Time (ms) : Combined
widgets.nrql: from Transaction SELECT average(duration)*1000 AS 'ms' WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 hours ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Top Slowest Transactions : On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) AS 'sec' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' FACET name SINCE 1 hours ago

widgets.title: Top Slowest Transactions : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) AS 'sec' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' FACET name SINCE 1 hours ago

widgets.title: Top Slowest Transactions : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(duration) AS 'sec' WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') FACET name SINCE 1 hours ago

widgets.title: Database Response Time (ms): On-Premises
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(databaseDuration)*1000 AS 'ms' WHERE appName LIKE '%_OP' SINCE 1 hours ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Database Response Time (ms) : AWS
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(databaseDuration)*1000 AS 'ms' WHERE appName LIKE '%_AWS' SINCE 1 hours ago TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Database Response Time (ms) : Combined
widgets.nrql: FROM Transaction SELECT average(databaseDuration)*1000 AS 'ms' WHERE (appName LIKE '%_OP' OR appName LIKE '%_AWS') SINCE 1 hours ago TIMESERIES
